name: @itk-viewer/blosc-zarr
description: Decompress Blosc compressed Zarr data in the browser

scripts.build:all: sh ./download-c-blosc.sh && npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:bindgen
scripts.build:bindgen: itk-wasm -i itkwasm/emscripten:latest -s . -b emscripten-build bindgen --package-name @itk-viewer/blosc-zarr --package-description "Decompress Blosc compressed Zarr data in WebAssembly." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/itk-viewer'

author: Matt McCormick
